item.title: Y Combinator backs its first defense startup, Ares Industries
item.description:
Y Combinator’s first defense startup, Ares Industries, launched earlier this week. In a post on the YC website, the startup outlined a vision to build low-cost cruise missiles that will be compatible with existing launch platforms, saying it will “deliver the capabilities that the [Department of Defense] wants in a form factor that’s 10x smaller […]

item.title: Telegram says arrested CEO Durov has 'nothing to hide'
item.description: Telegram says it is "absurd" to claim a platform or its owner is responsible for abuse of that platform.

item.title: China slams US for adding firms to export control list, vows action
